articles.author: Eric Sylvers, Jason Douglas
articles.title: Return to School Tests Europe’s Containment of Covid-19 - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: High vaccination rates and mask mandates boost confidence that Europe can avoid a resurgence of the virus
articles.content:
Europe, having passed the U.S. in Covid-19 vaccinations, is facing the biggest test of its progress against the virus: reopening schools in the face of the Delta variant.
The continents return to sc… [+230 chars]
